body.name: Looped-End String Wet Mop, Heavy Duty Commercial Industrial Dust Mop with 45 inch Stainless Steel Pole, 2 Replacement Floor Mop Heads for Floor, Hardwood, Laminate, Tiles Cleaning (Blue&Orange)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 23 hrs 30 mins
features: 🎀Looped-End Design - The industrial mop head with loop-end design, which can prevent the loops from getting tangle and reduce fraying. Also helps the mop to be placed on the ground to achieve the maximum contact with the ground.

🎀Strong Absorbent Mop Head - This high-quality cotton fiber mop head adopts a heavy-duty stitching design with many layers of yarn that can absorb the dirty water and stains easier, quickly grab the dirt and dust on the floor. The wet mop head can be cleaned by machine.

Adjustable Handle - Looped-end string wet mop with stainless steel handle, not easy to rust and durable. The length is adjustable to 67.3 in to meet different needs. The industrial mop comes with a hanging loop for easy storage.

Flexible Jaw Clamp - The industrial mop pole has a clamping claw at the bottom, the opening and closing of the jaw can be controlled by rotating the knob above the jaw, which is easy to remove and replace the mop head.

Multi-purpose Use - Our commercial industrial mop is very suitable for commercial and home floor cleaning.It can be used to clean tile floor, marble floor, concrete floor, hardwood floor, and more. If there are any problems in the process of use, you can always contact us! 💗

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soft and absorbance
reviews.reviewText: Color is good and size is perfect. Easy to use and easy to dry. I like the Mops.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars 2 Mop Heads for 1 Price
reviews.reviewText: I replaced my old wooden industrial with this lighter weight heavy duty mop. I like that it is adjustable in height and comes with 2 mop heads. The mop heads fits securely in place with an easy close clamp. Mop heads are machine washable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very nice String wet Mop!
reviews.reviewText: This mop is a house cleaning game changer! I have had many mops and no other mop has help up and soaked up as much liquid as this one has. It will clean tile and hardwood with ease. The mop is easy to assemble and even clean the strings by just removing the mop bottom or rinsing it inside a bucket. The mop is sturdy and doesn't bend when using it. It is a great mop with the ability to clean with ease! Two thumbs up!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is a great quality mop it's very sturdy and adorable. At first I couldn't figure out how to change the mop head but once I did it was easy to place. It's easy to Assemble. It's worth the price. Very easy to clean slapping in the washing machine and go.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Looped End Mop
reviews.reviewText: I am extremely pleased with this industrial mop – it has proven to be a much needed item for my floor cleaning routine. The looped-end design is a standout feature, preventing tangles and reducing fraying, ensuring the mop maintains optimal contact with the ground.The strong absorbent cotton fiber mop head with a heavy-duty stitching design makes cleaning a breeze. It efficiently absorbs dirty water and stains, swiftly grabbing dirt and dust from the floor. The added convenience of machine washability is a time-saver.The adjustable stainless steel handle is not only durable but also rust-resistant. With a length that can be adjusted up to 67.3 inches, it caters to various needs. The hanging loop allows for easy storage, keeping the space tidy.The flexible jaw clamp on the industrial mop pole is a thoughtful addition, offering easy removal and replacement of the mop head. The control knob above the jaw ensures smooth operation.Versatility is a key strength of this mop. Ideal for both commercial and home floor cleaning, it tackles various surfaces including tile, marble, concrete, and hardwood floors with ease.Should any issues arise during use, the assurance of continuous support by the seller adds an extra layer of satisfaction. In conclusion, this industrial mop has exceeded my expectations, making floor cleaning efficient and hassle-free. I highly recommend it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Little small for commercial use
reviews.reviewText: This is very nice mop head and it works well, however, it is a little small for restaurant use. I think it would work better for home.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars High quality mop
reviews.reviewText: This mop does a great job cleaning the floor without leaving mop strings behind.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This is the mop of all mops! First, it was incredibly easy to assemble. Simply twist the poles together and the handle is complete. The mop head binds in the middle on the padding, and you place into the red piece at the end of the mop then twist the red handle to tighten. Crazy easy! The mop heads are super thick and high quality. Easy to wring out. They cover a good size area while mopping. I love that they are washable, and you get two so you can rotate while washing/drying. The handle is super long, but if you don't want it quite so long it's easy to remove one piece to shorten it. I personally LOVE the length. It makes it very easy to mop under things. I highly recommend this mop.
